synopsis:
Unaired episodes 36-39 of Hoshi no Oujisama Petit Prince.
NOTE FOR MODS: I have no idea if it was released on home-video for VHS or LD. Basically anything earlier than the 2006 DVD release, ergo I put the DVD date as the release date since that's the only concrete evidence as given by Amazon.

title.en: The Adventures of the Little Prince
